fr_ours: Improves efficiency of molten carbonate fuel cells by adjusting hydrogen provided to the anode, increasing utilization beyond traditional 70%-75%.

However, since both patents tie in functional purpose, technical uniqueness, and neither can be said to have a majority win, they are considered equally valuable.
